/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the city's daily life. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, providing a vibrant contrast to the urban landscape. Cars of various colors are scattered along the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. Buildings of different heights and designs flank the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky overhead is overcast, casting a soft light over the scene.
